mapper.delete: delete from cart where member_mem_id = #{member_mem_id} and product_option_pro_opt_id =#{product_option_pro_opt_id}
delete from cart where member_mem_id = #{mem_id} and cart_select='1'
mapper.select: select sum(c.cart_amount*p.pro_price) as totalprice from cart c, product p, product_option po where p.pro_id= po.product_pro_id and po.pro_opt_id=c.product_option_pro_opt_id and c.cart_select='1' and c.member_mem_id =#{mem_id}
